storyInfo: In a university campus lying in a town in Ursus' north, Talulah finds the 'person' she's been looking for.

attributes.text: Terran Calendar 31, the Empire of Hippogryph was officially renamed the Empire of Ursus. We have already spent two lectures talking about and analyzing this piece of history.

Historians believe that the cause of the Hippogryphs' fall from power was primarily its ruling class's corruption and incompetence, as well as the rise of Ursus and the forces of production that it represents.

This war is often referred to as Ursus's uprising, representing the Ancients' standing up against the Elders' authority. From this point onward, the legitimacy of the Elders' rulership across Terra gradually waned.
Yet if we look back on this war from a different perspective, we'll find a set of questions that naturally follow.
Suppose it was another Ursus race that had been ruling the country instead of the Hippogryphs. Would the revolution still have taken place?
If, as the rulers, the Hippogryphs had not insisted on a policy of racial discrimination, if they stopped taking Ursus wealth as their own and gave the Ursus equal opportunity...
Would the Hippogryph Empire's downfall have been averted, or would it have come sooner?
What if... the Khagan's cavalry never set foot on these lands?'

attributes.content: Hello, are you here to listen in on Miss Koshelna's lecture?
attributes.name: Young Ursus Student

attributes.content: Miss... Koshelna?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: That's right. Her lectures on imperial history are very popular.
attributes.name: Young Ursus Student

attributes.content: I've been noticing young men and women such as yourself listening in from the hallway. You aren't one of our students, are you? You don't look like a college student.
attributes.name: Young Ursus Student

attributes.content: You can actually go inside if you'd like. She's not going to mind if you stand in the back of the classroom. You'll be able to hear her more clearly.
attributes.name: Young Ursus Student

attributes.content: No need. Her voice is pretty clear as is.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Okay, then. This lecture is almost over anyway. I still have other lectures to attend, so please excuse me.
attributes.name: Young Ursus Student

attributes.content: By all means, please.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.text: 'You may not be able to find the answers to these questions in any textbooks.
But I hope you will give them some thought. Let them occupy your brain as you eat, as you bathe, and even as you sleep...
And when an idea has lingered in your brain long enough, write it down. I'm very interested in your opinions.
Okay, let's wrap it up here. Enjoy your brief freedom until the next bell.'

attributes.content: Do you have any questions, Miss?
attributes.name: Hippogryph Teacher

attributes.content: Found you.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Why did she go into the city?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: To look for someone.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: And why is this someone worth the risk?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Nine, you said it yourself. We can't get anywhere close to the nomadic cities while we're in Ursus.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: We want to pass judgment on her, don't we? Before she talks, she needs an answer still.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Without this answer, she won't even believe half a word she says herself, and neither will we.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: We shouldn't be believing her to begin with!
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: She went into the city herself. What if she makes a run for it? All the efforts and sacrifices that went into rescuing her and all our plans about her going forward will all go to waste!
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: They won't.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: She knows very well that she has nowhere to go.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Besides, as long as you still trust me, I can guarantee you this. No matter where she goes, I will take her in again.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I trust you... but that's based on everything you've done for us in the past year.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: You're not like her. You don't talk big. This is something that all of us like about you. It's a good thing, and you should make sure you don't start picking up that habit.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Are you worried I'll be influenced by her?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I don't think that'll happen so easily.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Nine, a patrol unit is approaching—
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Stay hidden.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Just as we predicted. In half an hour, this route won't be so safe anymore.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: She better come back in time.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I thought I would've seen you much sooner—
attributes.name: Hippogryph Teacher

attributes.content: —Talulah.
attributes.name: Hippogryph Teacher

attributes.content: Koshelna... Couldn't have picked a more obvious name, could you, Kashchey?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ah... Names. Names are just a way to refer to people. If the sound of this name reminds you of certain unpleasant memories, you can call me Fiolet.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Never mind. Your name is of little importance to me. Just like your appearance, your name is not worth remembering.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Why have you come then, Talulah?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Because you want a definite answer from me? Because you want me to tell you that, yes, Kashchey has left your body, and you're just Talulah and no one else?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: In that case, you will get what you want. I can tell you exactly what you want to hear right now.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: The question then is... are you willing to believe me?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: You want me to believe a Black Snake?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Is this a new trick you're playing, Kashchey?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You gave me more than enough information to find you in the shortest amount of time. I can only assume that you were luring me here.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Have you gone back to our home, then? Our home, both yours and mine?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: That's not my home. It's nothing more than ground zero of a conspiracy, a nest beloved of venomous snakes.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: That's an awfully hurtful way to describe it.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: But you read my letter nonetheless, didn't you? You remembered the channels through which Duke Kashchey received the Scales' correspondence. Not even the Secret Police who took over the dukedom could figure it out.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: A letter sent ten years ago, and its sender is tenured here at this college.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I don't know if I should be gasping in admiration of how well prepared you are, or if I should be grateful that this channel stayed hidden for ten years while your Scales have long been reduced to nothing?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Does it make you happy that the territory has fallen into such neglect? Talulah, under your rule, they could have lived a much better life. They shouldn't have been torn to shreds by the Fourth Army.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Stop pretending you care about them more than I do.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Tell me. What is there in this small northern town for you to willingly stay here?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Kashchey, if I remember correctly, you preferred cities further south.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Not only because the air there is more humid, but also because lands where you cultivated generations of authority are more suitable for your scheming.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But not the tundra. The folk here lead a hard life. They have plenty to worry about sorting out issues with their food and harvest.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: To them, the speeches you pride yourself on are like the artificial flower you wear. No purpose beyond aesthetics.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Talulah... Talulah.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: What if I told you I'm here because your footsteps can be found in the tundra?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: I'd say you're feeding me nonsense.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: 'The history of humanity is a history of struggle.'
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: You remember, don't you?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: You applied everything that I taught you through the years to your struggle.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: If you remember all of that, then shouldn't Talulah, the Fighter of the Tundra, and Talulah, the woman who succeeded the title of duke, be one and the same to me?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Yet you destroyed everything that I built in the tundra.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Did I?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Who do you truly blame for this series of fatal mistakes in your heart?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: If you actually thought yourself innocent, you wouldn't have needed a year and a half to ponder how you should die.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: The very moment your head turns, you will throw yourself into the next struggle.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Talulah, I know why you came to me.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: You want to use your judgment on me to judge yourself. You want to hear me repent, so that you can start repenting yourself.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: What you want is a tiny, pitiable bit of mental comfort.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You want me to go on? I thought—
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: You thought I would let you witness my fury? No, Kashchey. You don't deserve it.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I've rehearsed everything you've said up to this very moment in my head, down to the very last word. A year and a half isn't that short, and I had nothing to do while I was imprisoned at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If you want to survive this meeting, you'll need to say something more original.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Very well. I can tell you've gotten more patient, thanks to that period of self-imprisonment.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: But I brought up the tundra not because I wanted to provoke you.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Take a look at this school. Look at the students' faces.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: They believe that the sunlight of may will melt the tundra's snow. They also believe that Ursus, colder and harder than even the tundra, will change beneath their feet.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: So you're sullying their innocence with your despicable ideas?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You think I'm trying to find the next successor among them?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: No, my dear. I'm just a normal university lecturer. The only things that I impart here are knowledge and ideas. I hold no authority or wealth.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: If they want authority, they can fight for it themselves. If they seek a conspiracy, they are free to find the most suitable techniques in my lessons.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: You want me to believe that the failure you experienced through me devastated you so much that you washed your hands of it all?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Failure? I never thought of that as failure.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Reunion was not destroyed in the Chernobog core city, and neither was Kashchey's plan.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Right, you managed to stop Kashchey. The war he sought, the war that could've changed Ursus history in an instant never came to be.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: But Ursus still went on the trajectory that Kashchey had set for her.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: War is happening. The conflict between the Council and the Army intensified, and the will of the people is sparking new flames through each and every conflict.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: And I will stand atop the most fertile soil, sowing seeds to the best of my abilities.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: I will guide... or perhaps I should say spur these revolutions to take root.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: I remember you once refuted the education of the masses as meaningless.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If a ruler is so inflexible that she does not adapt to the changing tides, then she is undoubtedly following a path of destruction.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: You still see yourself as a ruler. I see. You actually haven't changed at all.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I almost forgot you hated that word as much as you hated Kashchey's control. I told you long ago that I didn't care who was in charge.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: How many times has power changed hands since the Ursus took these lands from the Hippogryphs?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Talulah, you are me, and I am you.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: What we want... is an Ursus that can yet spark fires from our hands.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: These fires... will sooner or later engulf all of Ursus. No, not just Ursus. Victoria... and all the other countries will be caught in the flames too.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: When the fire is over, will these lands become more prosperous? Or will they be dealt destruction?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Ursus has walked its first millennium. I will guide it down its second and third. This is the meaning behind the Black Snake's existence.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: The Black Snake is immortal not because I want to live, but because Ursus must live.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: The Aslan heir has returned to Londinium?
It seems that way.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: The Sarkaz gave us this information in exchange for the Sarkaz Messenger we returned to them.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: 'In exchange?'
They're merely using us to escalate the scuffle among the dukes.
It couldn't be more obvious, but we can also tell from their methods that the situation in Londinium has changed, and the Sarkaz are anxious.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: Did the Sarkaz say anything else?
Nothing useful.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: Hmph, ever since our spy's cover was blown, we haven't gotten much news from Londinium.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: Unfortunate.
Right... it's unfortunate. Fortunately, our losses are still manageable.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: Right, there is another piece of news that might be important.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: We caught wind of this from a Columbian arms dealer we've worked with—
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: About a month ago, that organization called Reunion recovered their previous 'leader.'
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: You mean...
Talulah.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: If all the information we've received thus far is correct, she... she could very well be a Draco.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: Y-You havin' a laugh? N-No funnin' here, now?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Why would I do that?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Gimme a slap.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'm sorry?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Smack me right now. Otherwise, I might think I'm dreamin'!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: There's a wall over there. Knock yourself out. Try not to ram it so hard you knock it down, though. Otherwise, you'll have some explaining to do to the county's mounted police.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I... I'm not sure what to say...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Are you really so shocked? You were the one who's been going 'Leader's got to be alive' day in and day out.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I thought... I could...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You thought she'd be waiting for you to rescue her somewhere?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But it's more of a surprise, knowin' she made it out!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Thanks, Chenchen. If it wasn't for you, I wouldn't have met Rhodes Island. If I hadn't joined Rhodes Island, they wouldn't've helped get her out. I'm so happy, waaaaahhhhh...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No hugging!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Waaaahhh! But I'm so glad!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: At the very least... a little less of a squeeze... Urgh...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wait, Chenchen, does that mean... you're gonna leave then? You promised to help me rescue her, but she doesn't need me to rescue her anymore.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Times like these, you think pretty fast, don't you?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: To tell you the truth, I've thought about it. Ever since I found out she'd escaped, I've been thinkin' of lookin' for her.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Actually, I can kinda tell...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ch'en Hui-chieh never gives up halfway.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We've come so far, and finally found ourselves some clues.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Bagpipe, I'll get to the bottom of this with you. 'Until the day the spectre force is exposed for all to see again.' Only then will I do what I should've done long ago.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I will find Talulah.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Think, Talulah. Think with all the techniques that you learned from Kashchey whether everything that I say comes from the bottom of my heart.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Will you kill me here, then? You had to avoid the Royal Guard's watchful eyes, so you don't have a sword.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: And so you must kill me with your flames. Will you commit such a horrifying crime in front of all my students, who have nothing but admiration for me?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: If I wanted to kill you, I wouldn't pick a method that would startle anyone.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Don't forget. You taught me all of this.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Will killing me satisfy you?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: If that doesn't give you the satisfaction you need, I could give you a second, if not third name.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: You're telling me that, aside from you, there is more than one Black Snake within Ursus's borders.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You could also think that I'm trying to deceive you to live longer.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Your new body is... fragile.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It wouldn't take any more work to kill you than it took to kill that old Phidia.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What are you waiting for, then? Quick, turn my body to ash, and scatter it all across this dark hallway!
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: 'Terrifying Infected Murderer Reemerges in College Campus' —That's the headline that will don the front pages tomorrow.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You wouldn't mind having that on your reputation.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: I should point out that I'm not afraid of the patrol unit who will be here in three minutes, either.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But... your new old friends who are waiting outside the city... They don't stand a chance against the Royal Guards.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Even if they begrudgingly allowed you to return to Ursus because of those in control... They wouldn't tolerate murdering anyone on Ursus land.
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: Kashchey.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If the Royal Guards found out that the immortal monster—the mastermind behind the Chernobog incident was right here, do you think they would try to take me in or turn their attention and blades to you?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: So, why haven't you killed me yet?
attributes.name: Koshelna

attributes.content: It's almost time.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: She's not back yet? Nine, you're mistaken about her, aren't you?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: If she doesn't show up when it's time, all of you will evacuate as planned.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: And you?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: She's wearing my handcuffs, and that makes her my prisoner. I will take her in myself.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Sounds like I saved you the trouble, then.
—Talulah.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: You're back. Not a minute late either. Is your business done?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: More or less.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: So?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: You want to know what I got out of her? I was going to spare your ears my long-winded grumblings.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Good. You seem to have lightened up. Even found yourself a sense of humor.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: So, what about the evil god? Did you slay him?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: She said that's not who she is anymore.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And you bought it?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: No, but I also am not the old Talulah who would think that killing her would solve all our problems.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I won't let her out of my sight, and when the time comes, I will kill her myself.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But I have a weird feeling about this...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: A weird feeling?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: An immortal evil god... will die eventually, but I won't be the one to kill her.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: —Ursus will kill her.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Even now, she thinks she can bend human will. We will prove to her, though—
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: One day, the people will awaken and abandon the ignorant conqueror.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And on that day, there will be no more Black Snakes in Ursus.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What about now, then?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Now, before we come back here for the last time, we need to visit Victoria.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: So you've decided to come with us?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I'm your prisoner. I have nowhere to go except with you.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Besides, you said it yourself... The Infected there are waiting for us.
attributes.name: Talulah
